attributes.action: Urge Season Ticket Teen to return to the LTLF Forums
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: He posted a picture in four minutes in 2007 and since then has never posted.  He is an expert on trains and also went to school with Jess.  We need his input.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
